website_summaries.verdict: Silica supplement in liquid form with added trace minerals.
pros: Manufactured under strict GMP- and FDA-compliant conditions
GMP certification by prestigious Natural Product Association
Addition of trace minerals  provides "unique nutritional delivery system" to all cells of the body
cons: A small percentage of users complained of various negative physical side effects
Even though this bottle is a 40-day supply, that's still nearly $0.75 per day

customer_reviews.title: It works better than you can imagine!
customer_reviews.text: This is a truly amazing product. It has cleared the fog from my mind. My son asked what I was putting in my water. I explained to him what it does and he said, oh that's why you've been more on point lately and more like your usual self when discussing anything. That was a nice bonus verification of this products capabilities. I just purchased my second bottle, the first is almost gone. It also makes the water so refreshing, I add it to spring water, not tap. I am so grateful for this product, it has been a Godsend for me. Many thanks 🙏🏼
customer_reviews.author: T. Suttles

customer_reviews.title: Best Product EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product! I started taking it and within a few days, I had so much more energy and my horrible anxiety was about 80% better. I was able to get out of bed easier, more energy and able to complete things that I normally couldn't due to my bad anxiety! It is amazing. I love it and will take it forever!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa G.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, Worked much better for me than horsetail ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product, Worked much better for me than horsetail supplements (which contain silica). Some imiprovement now of nails and seems like eyelashes are growing in more thickly. Best of all, seems like life stresses are not getting at me so much, feel more stable, relaxed and peaceful overall. Also, have given some to my hens, who have not been laying well. Now I'm getting more eggs and they seem happier, too. (Silicon interacts with sulfur in the body, and eggs contain sulfur, so maybe they were deficient in silicon?)
customer_reviews.author: sharon77777

customer_reviews.title: Mental clarity to the max!
customer_reviews.text: I've only been taking this for a week. I lift weights and I'm working on general health. I have experienced mental clarity, reduced muscle aches, mid-day sleepiness vanished, and just the ability to have laser focus. This product is excellent. It doesn't have a prominent taste and it's easy to take in a cup of water. I'm hoping to see the hair benefits in the future but this is an awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: Valarie

customer_reviews.title: Really works for nails.
customer_reviews.text: Watch your nails grow like gangbusters! This stuff really works. Hair seems to be growing faster as well. I've started using it twice a day, 15 drops in a glass of water. You can't taste it, but it is definitely working.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Lynn

customer_reviews.title: It does work!
customer_reviews.text: I had a severe knee injury, pain 24-7 for one month with no sign of healing. After two weeks of cell food with silica, 4 drops twice a day, I have fineally seen a rapid improvement in the healing. After 3 weeks my pain is almost all gone and I feel an overall well feeling and energy. I was skeptical at first but I do recommend this product and think it will help different people with different problems and needs.

customer_reviews.title: awsome

customer_reviews.title: Very Potent Source
customer_reviews.text: Interesting product. My first few days using 10 drops just once was pretty phenomenal. Great energy and clarity. 3 days later though and my system is topped up. I'll continue to use but once per week or every other week might be enough. I also use Restore and Vital Earth minerals from time to time so I may not be too deficient. But for me it's very potent! Great product. Planning to try the Cell Food.

customer_reviews.title: This product is tasteless and easily consumed in your favorite liquid

Without this, the bone is weak, muscle fatigue, I fall, and cancer would continue to pit inside the bone marrow. This product is tasteless and easily consumed in your favorite liquid, makes your nails and hair grow fast and healthier which is the secondary benefit I am receiving. Most of all, it helps tremendously with the bone cancer and stregthens celllar recovery time. I only wish it was cheaper :/

customer_reviews.title: Cellfood Silica vs. Biosil Silica
customer_reviews.text: I used Biosil silica (liquid form) for approximately 4 months and experienced a considerable amount of hair growth but no fingernail growth. I just started using cell food silica and have already seen a considerable amount of fingernail growth in the first week. I take 15 drops twice a day in orange juice (I've read that vitamin C enhances the effects of silica, although I can't say if this is true). The fingernail growth I am seeing with the cell food silica tells me that this product may be more effective than the biosil silica, but only time will tell if this holds true for hair growth.

customer_reviews.title: better hair and nails
customer_reviews.text: This product is outstanding for the betterment of my hair and my fingernails. I notice a big difference in these if I do not order on time and I notice that my nails become brittle and my hair becomes dry and unmanagable. I have used this product for at least 5 years.
customer_reviews.author: Claire M. Luck

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Service, price, delivery and product could not be improved upon, in my opinion!
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this product and this retailer, for someone interested in purchasing this as well as other similiar products offered by DailyVita

product_meta.title: Cellfood Essential Silica Formula, 4 oz. Bottle - 40 Day Supply, Highly Effective, Contains Necessary Nutritional Co-Factors - Liquid for Superior Absorption - Gluten Free, GMO Free
feature_bullets: Contains easy-to-absorb silica and all the additional trace minerals your body needs to optimize its effectiveness. Pleasant taste, unlike many other Silica products. Economical 40 day supply.
CELLFOOD Essential Silica supports bones, joints and muscles; connective tissue; hair, skin, teeth and gums; heart and brain function.
We combine this solution with the remarkable CELLFOOD formula— providing a unique nutritional delivery system into every cell of the body.
Studies show that silica can counteract the effects of aluminum on the body and therefore may be important in supporting neurological health.

Manufactured under strict Good Manufacturing Standards by NuScience Corporation— an FDA-compliant manufacturer with third-party cGMP certification by the prestigious Natural Product Association. Accept no substitutes.
